Type FSharpEntity

Namespace Microsoft.FSharp.Metadata

Represents an F# type or module

Public static methods

FSharpEntity FromType(Type ty)

Return the FSharpEntity corresponding to a.NET type

Public properties

FSharpType AbbreviatedType get;

FSharpAccessibility Accessibility get;

Get the declared accessibility of the type

ReadOnlyCollection<FSharpAttribute> Attributes get;

Get the declared attributes for the type

FSharpType BaseType get;

Base type, if any

string CompiledName get;

Get the compiled name of the type or module, possibly with `n mangling. This is identical to LogicalName unless the CompiledName attribute is used.

SourceLocation DeclarationLocation get;

Get the declaration location for the type constructor

FSharpEntity DeclaringEntity get;

Get the entity containing the type or module, if any

string DisplayName get;

Get the name of the type or module as displayed in F# code

ReadOnlyCollection<FSharpGenericParameter> GenericParameters get;

Get the generic parameters, possibly including unit-of-measure parameters

bool HasAssemblyCodeRepresentation get;

Indicates the type is implemented through a mapping to IL assembly code. THis is only true for types in FSharp.Core.dll

bool HasFSharpModuleSuffix get;

Indicates that a module is compiled to a class with the given mangled name. The mangling is reversed during lookup

ReadOnlyCollection<FSharpType> Implements get;

Interface implementations - boolean indicates compiler-generated

bool IsAbbreviation get;

Indicates the entity is a measure, type or exception abbreviation

bool IsExceptionDeclaration get;

Indicates an F# exception declaration

bool IsExternal get;

If true, then this is a reference to something in some.NET assembly from another.NET language

bool IsMeasure get;

Indicates the entity is a measure definition

bool IsModule get;

Indicates the entity is an F# module definition

bool IsRecord get;

Indicates the entity is record type

bool IsUnion get;

Indicates the entity is union type

bool IsValueType get;

Indicates the entity is a struct or enum

string LogicalName get;

Get the name of the type or module, possibly with `n mangling

ReadOnlyCollection<FSharpMemberOrVal> MembersOrValues get;

Properties, methods etc. with implementations, also values in a module

string Namespace get;

Get the namespace containing the type or module, if any

ReadOnlyCollection<FSharpEntity> NestedEntities get;

string QualifiedName get;

Get the fully qualified name of the type or module

ReadOnlyCollection<FSharpRecordField> RecordFields get;

Get the fields of the class, struct or enum

Assembly ReflectionAssembly get;

Get the System.Reflection.Assembly for the type May raise an exception if an assembly load fails

Type ReflectionType get;

Get the System.Type for the type Raises InvalidOperationException if the type is an abbreviation or has an assembly code representation.

FSharpAccessibility RepresentationAccessibility get;

Get the declared accessibility of the representation, not taking signatures into account

ReadOnlyCollection<FSharpUnionCase> UnionCases get;

Get the cases of a discriminated union

bool UsesPrefixDisplay get;

Indicates the type prefers the "tycon" syntax for display etc.

string XmlDocSig get;

Get the XML documentation signature for the entity
